title: Transport Route Configuration
description: Configuration for a transport route in the atlas-transports service

startMapId.description: Docked/observation map where vessel status is shown

stagingMapId.description: Boarding waiting room where players wait before departure

destinationMapId.description: Arrival station map where players are warped after journey

observationMapId.description: Map for broadcast events (usually same as startMapId)

boardingWindowDurationMinutes.description: Duration in minutes that players can board

preDepartureDurationMinutes.description: Time in minutes between boarding close and departure

cycleIntervalMinutes.description: Time in minutes between boarding window starts
